clues.text: Rudolph is the commander of Gessler's archers in this opera

The title character of this 1816 opera is in service with the Venetian army

In 1923 she won a Pulitzer for her novel "One of Ours", set where else but in Nebraska

6-letter word used to express sorrow or regret

A thin membrane or layer, as of bone, tissue or cell walls

When talking about cholesterol, its the "D" in HDL & LDL
CLL is the chronic lymphocytic type of this cancer

This "Great" Brit was the youngest son of King Ethelwulf

Wintry title of Neal Stephenson's cyberpunk novel about a hacker/pizza deliveryman

The airport at Latacunga in this country is called Cotopaxi, though the city has suffered from the Cotopaxi volcano

rounds.text: The first object in our solar system discovered by telescope was not a planet but one of these
